LanguageData.FExt_Shelf.label: Fire Extinguisher Shelf
LanguageData.FExt_Shelf.description: Fire extinguishers stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.FExt_CeilingFoamPopper.label: Ceiling firefoam popper
LanguageData.FExt_CeilingFoamPopper.description: When it detects fire, this safety device pops and sprays a fire-retardant foam in a circular field around itself on the floor. Can also be triggered manually.
